welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kochi, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, beautiful coastline, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kochi has to offer.

restaurants.name: Myojinmaru (明神丸)
restaurants.description: Myojinmaru (明神丸) is a seafood restaurant located in 高知市.
restaurants.address: 帯屋町2-3-1 (ひろめ市場), 高知市, 高知県, 780-0841

restaurants.name: Hirome Ichiba (ひろめ市場)
restaurants.description: Hirome Ichiba (ひろめ市場) is a food court located in 高知市.

restaurants.name: Myojinmaru (明神丸 本店)
restaurants.description: Myojinmaru (明神丸 本店) is a seafood restaurant located in 高知市.

restaurants.name: 屋台安兵衛
restaurants.description: 屋台安兵衛 is a dumpling restaurant located in 高知市.

restaurants.name: Myojinmaru (明神丸 帯屋町店)
restaurants.description: Myojinmaru (明神丸 帯屋町店) is a seafood restaurant located in 高知市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kochi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kochi Airport, used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
